sect2.title: Purpose of this document
sect2.para: This page describes a minimal installation of OpenACS with PostGreSQL (not Oracle). It will produce a working OpenACS installation in under an hour. It excludes source control, full text search, ssl, managed services (daemontools), DocBook, and qmail.
